description: Describes a solution. For more information on solutions, see CreateSolution.

parameters.name: solutionArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the solution to describe.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the solution.

nested_items.name: solutionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the solution.

nested_items.name: performHPO
nested_items.description: Whether to perform hyperparameter optimization (HPO) on the chosen recipe. The default is false.

nested_items.name: performAutoML
nested_items.description: When true, Amazon Personalize performs a search for the best USER_PERSONALIZATION recipe from the list specified in the solution configuration ( recipeArn must not be specified). When false (the default), Amazon Personalize uses recipeArn for training.

nested_items.name: performAutoTraining
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the solution automatically creates solution versions. The default is True and the solution automatically creates new solution versions every 7 days.

nested_items.name: recipeArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the recipe used to create the solution. This is required when performAutoML is false.

nested_items.name: datasetGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset group that provides the training data.

nested_items.name: eventType
nested_items.description: The event type (for example, --click' or --like') that is used for training the model. If no eventType is provided, Amazon Personalize uses all interactions for training with equal weight regardless of type.

nested_items.name: solutionConfig
nested_items.description: Describes the configuration properties for the solution.

nested_items.name: eventValueThreshold
nested_items.description: Only events with a value greater than or equal to this threshold are used for training a model.

nested_items.name: hpoConfig
nested_items.description: Describes the properties for hyperparameter optimization (HPO).

nested_items.name: hpoObjective
nested_items.description: The metric to optimize during HPO.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the metric. Valid values are Maximize and Minimize.

nested_items.name: metricName
nested_items.description: The name of the metric.

nested_items.name: metricRegex
nested_items.description: A regular expression for finding the metric in the training job logs.

nested_items.name: hpoResourceConfig
nested_items.description: Describes the resource configuration for HPO.

nested_items.name: maxNumberOfTrainingJobs
nested_items.description: The maximum number of training jobs when you create a solution version. The maximum value for maxNumberOfTrainingJobs is 40.

nested_items.name: maxParallelTrainingJobs
nested_items.description: The maximum number of parallel training jobs when you create a solution version. The maximum value for maxParallelTrainingJobs is 10.

nested_items.name: algorithmHyperParameterRanges
nested_items.description: The hyperparameters and their allowable ranges.

nested_items.name: integerHyperParameterRanges
nested_items.description: The integer-valued hyperparameters and their ranges.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the hyperparameter.

nested_items.name: minValue
nested_items.description: The minimum allowable value for the hyperparameter.

nested_items.name: maxValue
nested_items.description: The maximum allowable value for the hyperparameter.

nested_items.name: continuousHyperParameterRanges
nested_items.description: The continuous hyperparameters and their ranges.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the hyperparameter.

nested_items.name: minValue
nested_items.description: The minimum allowable value for the hyperparameter.

nested_items.name: maxValue
nested_items.description: The maximum allowable value for the hyperparameter.

nested_items.name: categoricalHyperParameterRanges
nested_items.description: The categorical hyperparameters and their ranges.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the hyperparameter.

nested_items.name: values
nested_items.description: A list of the categories for the hyperparameter.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: algorithmHyperParameters
nested_items.description: Lists the algorithm hyperparameters and their values.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: featureTransformationParameters
nested_items.description: Lists the feature transformation parameters.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: autoMLConfig
nested_items.description: The AutoMLConfig object containing a list of recipes to search when AutoML is performed.

nested_items.name: metricName
nested_items.description: The metric to optimize.

nested_items.name: recipeList
nested_items.description: The list of candidate recipes.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: eventsConfig
nested_items.description: Describes the configuration of an event, which includes a list of event parameters. You can specify up to 10 event parameters. Events are used in solution creation.

nested_items.name: eventParametersList
nested_items.description: A list of event parameters, which includes event types and their event value thresholds and weights.

nested_items.name: eventType
nested_items.description: The name of the event type to be considered for solution creation.

nested_items.name: eventValueThreshold
nested_items.description: The threshold of the event type. Only events with a value greater or equal to this threshold will be considered for solution creation.

nested_items.name: weight
nested_items.description: The weight of the event type. A higher weight means higher importance of the event type for the created solution.

nested_items.name: optimizationObjective
nested_items.description: Describes the additional objective for the solution, such as maximizing streaming minutes or increasing revenue. For more information see Optimizing a solution.

nested_items.name: itemAttribute
nested_items.description: The numerical metadata column in an Items dataset related to the optimization objective. For example, VIDEO_LENGTH (to maximize streaming minutes), or PRICE (to maximize revenue).

nested_items.name: objectiveSensitivity
nested_items.description: Specifies how Amazon Personalize balances the importance of your optimization objective versus relevance.

nested_items.name: trainingDataConfig
nested_items.description: Specifies the training data configuration to use when creating a custom solution version (trained model).

nested_items.name: excludedDatasetColumns
nested_items.description: Specifies the columns to exclude from training. Each key is a dataset type, and each value is a list of columns. Exclude columns to control what data Amazon Personalize uses to generate recommendations.
(string) ---
(list) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: autoTrainingConfig
nested_items.description: Specifies the automatic training configuration to use.

nested_items.name: schedulingExpression
nested_items.description: Specifies how often to automatically train new solution versions. Specify a rate expression in rate(value unit) format. For value, specify a number between 1 and 30. For unit, specify day or days. For example, to automatically create a new solution version every 5 days, specify rate(5 days). The default is every 7 days.

nested_items.name: autoMLResult
nested_items.description: When performAutoML is true, specifies the best recipe found.

nested_items.name: bestRecipeArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the best recipe.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the solution.
CREATE PENDING > CREATE IN_PROGRESS > ACTIVE -or- CREATE FAILED.
DELETE PENDING > DELETE IN_PROGRESS.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The creation date and time (in Unix time) of the solution.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time (in Unix time) that the solution was last updated.

nested_items.name: latestSolutionVersion
nested_items.description: Describes the latest version of the solution, including the status and the ARN.

nested_items.name: solutionVersionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the solution version.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the solution version.
CREATE PENDING > CREATE IN_PROGRESS > ACTIVE -or- CREATE FAILED.

nested_items.name: trainingMode
nested_items.description: The scope of training to be performed when creating the solution version. A FULL training considers all of the data in your dataset group. An UPDATE processes only the data that has changed since the latest training. Only solution versions created with the User-Personalization recipe can use UPDATE.

nested_items.name: trainingType
nested_items.description: Whether the solution version was created automatically or manually.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time (in Unix time) that this version of a solution was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time (in Unix time) that the solution version was last updated.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: If a solution version fails, the reason behind the failure.

nested_items.name: latestSolutionUpdate
nested_items.description: Provides a summary of the latest updates to the solution.

nested_items.name: solutionUpdateConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration details of the solution.

nested_items.name: autoTrainingConfig
nested_items.description: The automatic training configuration to use when performAutoTraining is true.

nested_items.name: schedulingExpression
nested_items.description: Specifies how often to automatically train new solution versions. Specify a rate expression in rate(value unit) format. For value, specify a number between 1 and 30. For unit, specify day or days. For example, to automatically create a new solution version every 5 days, specify rate(5 days). The default is every 7 days.

nested_items.name: eventsConfig
nested_items.description: Describes the configuration of an event, which includes a list of event parameters. You can specify up to 10 event parameters. Events are used in solution creation.

nested_items.name: eventParametersList
nested_items.description: A list of event parameters, which includes event types and their event value thresholds and weights.

nested_items.name: eventType
nested_items.description: The name of the event type to be considered for solution creation.

nested_items.name: eventValueThreshold
nested_items.description: The threshold of the event type. Only events with a value greater or equal to this threshold will be considered for solution creation.

nested_items.name: weight
nested_items.description: The weight of the event type. A higher weight means higher importance of the event type for the created solution.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the solution update. A solution update can be in one of the following states:

nested_items.name: performAutoTraining
nested_items.description: Whether the solution automatically creates solution versions.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time (in Unix format) that the solution update was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time (in Unix time) that the solution update was last updated.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: If a solution update fails, the reason behind the failure.
